title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\PrestoJob
name: PrestoJob
description:
A Dataproc job for running Presto queries.

IMPORTANT: The Dataproc Presto Optional Component must be enabled when the cluster is created to submit a Presto job to the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.PrestoJob

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.query_file_uri
params.description: The HCFS URI of the script that contains SQL queries.

params.name: data.continue_on_failure
params.description: Optional. Whether to continue executing queries if a query fails. The default value is false. Setting to true can be useful when executing independent parallel queries.

params.name: data.output_format
params.description: Optional. The format in which query output will be displayed. See the Presto documentation for supported output formats

params.name: data.client_tags
params.description: Optional. Presto client tags to attach to this query

params.name: data.properties
params.description: Optional. A mapping of property names to values. Used to set Presto session properties Equivalent to using the --session flag in the Presto CLI

params.name: data.logging_config
params.description: Optional. The runtime log config for job execution.
